title: Pipe reducing machine US-TSG-50
short_description: Serves for reducing metal pipes of the same thickness and size. This US-TSG-50 equipment is equipped with a 3 kW motor. The size of the compatible pipe is 50*50*1.5 mm, and the size of the equipment is 680*630*1320 mm. The total weight of the equipment is 660 kg.
short_description_uz: Bir xil qalinlik va kattalikdagi metal trubalarning uch qismini qizqartirish uchun xizmat qiladi. Ushbu US-TSG-50 uskuna 3 kW quvvatga ega motor bilan jihozlangan. Mos keluvchi truba o'lchami 50*50*1.5 mm, uskunaning o'lchami esa 680*630*1320 mm. Uskunaning umumiy vazni 660 kg dan iborat.
short_description_ru: Служит для докраски металлических труб одинаковой толщины и размера. Оборудование US-TSG-50  оснащено двигателем мощностью 3 кВт. Размер совместимой трубы 50*50*1,5 мм, а размер оборудования 680*630*1320 мм. Общий вес оборудования составляет 660 кг.
short_description_en: Serves for reducing metal pipes of the same thickness and size. This US-TSG-50 equipment is equipped with a 3 kW motor. The size of the compatible pipe is 50*50*1.5 mm, and the size of the equipment is 680*630*1320 mm. The total weight of the equipment is 660 kg.
long_description:
Serves for reducing metal pipes of the same thickness and size. This US-TSG-50 equipment is equipped with a 3 kW motor. The size of the compatible pipe is 50*50*1.5 mm, and the size of the equipment is 680*630*1320 mm. The total weight of the equipment is 660 kg.

 

Basic parameters
Model US-TSG-50
 Round tube 50*50*1.5 mm
Motor power......................................................... 3 kW................................................................................
Dimension 680*630*1320 mm
Packed size 780*730*1490 mm
Weight 660 kg

Bir xil qalinlik va kattalikdagi metal trubalarning uch qismini qizqartirish uchun xizmat qiladi. Ushbu US-TSG-50 uskuna 3 kW quvvatga ega motor bilan jihozlangan. Mos keluvchi truba o'lchami 50*50*1.5 mm, uskunaning o'lchami esa 680*630*1320 mm. Uskunaning umumiy vazni 660 kg dan iborat.
